creation_history: Created by Andreas on June 17th, 2021. Reason: unknown. Various people used the term "yakstack" beforehand.
description: Refers to the stuff you want to do in Serenity, your to-do list etc. Used similar to yakoverflow, just in general when referencing all of the many things that are to be done.
remark: But that's already on the stack
name: Yakstack
